mainText:
Dear Apple,

 

I hope that everyone at Apple can adjust to this very rough transition.
Everyone will miss Steve and I hope that his family continues to improve
over the coming months. He has influenced the company in many directions as
well as assisted the direction of the engineers and employees. 

 

We all appreciate you for all of your diligence in creating wonderful
products and services. 

 

Thank you.
author: Anonymous
